product_overview: Elder Line Assessment Platform is a comprehensive system designed to evaluate user knowledge through timed assessments, monitor performance with real-time analytics, and provide a detailed admin dashboard for compliance and topic focus insights. It supports user authentication and profile tracking to cater to organizational needs.
core_goals: Deliver a secure and user-friendly assessment engine for knowledge testing with timed questions and result computation.
Enable administrators to analyze user performance through an intuitive dashboard containing compliance charts and topic suggestions.
Provide real-time analytics to monitor platform usage including visitor activity and session metrics.
Support full user lifecycle management including signup, login, and detailed profile handling with employee identification.
Ensure a responsive and engaging landing page that works seamlessly across devices to attract and guide users.
key_features: Admin Dashboard presenting user performance analytics, compliance charts, and topic focus recommendations.
User Authentication and Profile Management including employee ID tracking and secure signup/login.
Assessment Engine with timed questions, real-time answer processing, and comprehensive result generation.
Real-time Analytics powered by WebSocket for live monitoring of page views, visitor count, and activity timestamps.
Mobile-optimized Responsive Landing Page with hero carousel and intuitive navigation for enhanced user engagement.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the responsive home page where they can navigate to signup or login.
Authenticated users access the assessment engine to complete timed tests consisting of multiple question cards.
Upon test completion, users receive immediate results and performance feedback.
Administrators log into the Admin Dashboard to review analytics on user performance and compliance.
Real-time analytics data updates continuously to provide live insights into user activity across the platform.
validation_criteria: Users must be able to successfully signup and login with employee ID verification.
Timed assessments should enforce time limits accurately and calculate scores correctly.
Admin Dashboard must display up-to-date analytics and compliance data without errors.
Real-time WebSocket analytics should reflect live page views and visitor statistics.
The landing page must be fully responsive and functional on all supported devices and screen sizes.
